```{r}
pitchers <- read_csv("CSVs/pitcher_comps.csv")

whiff <- pitchers %>% 
  mutate(whiff = description == "swinging_strike",
         whiff = as.character(whiff))

whiff %>% 
  filter(pitch_type == "FF") %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = whiff, y = pitch_speed)) +
  geom_violin() +
  geom_boxplot(alpha = 0.5) +
  # facet_wrap(~ inning) +
  NULL
  
```
